summary: UI/UX overhaul testing completed successfully. All pages display correctly with the new modern light theme, dark sidebar, gradient icons, and consistent styling. All CRUD operations and navigation work as expected.

integration_issues.issue: Login form shows loading spinner on Microsoft SSO button that doesn't complete - appears to be waiting for Microsoft SSO config. Direct API login works fine.
integration_issues.workaround: Login API works correctly, localStorage auth works

dashboard.details: Dashboard displays Data Lake Health zones (Raw: 117, Canonical: 116, Serving: 16), Data Quality Score (100%), Integrations (Odoo, Ms365 connected), Quick Actions

accounts_page_card_view.details: Card view displays 4 accounts with health badges (New, Healthy), Pipeline and Won Revenue metrics, website links

accounts_page_table_view.details: Table view toggle works, shows Account, Industry, Health, Pipeline, Won, Opps columns

accounts_create_modal.details: Create New Account modal opens with all form fields (Name, Industry, Website, Phone, Employee Count, Annual Revenue, Address, City, Country)

opportunities_page.details: KPI cards show Total Pipeline ($1,250,000), Won Revenue ($170,000), Active Deals (6), Avg Deal Size ($177,500). Opportunity list with stage badges

opportunities_create_modal.details: Add Opportunity modal opens with all fields including Product Lines selection (MSSP, Application Security, Network Security, GRC)

kpis_page.details: Category filter tabs (All, Sales, Activity, Relationship, Execution) work correctly. Summary stats and charts display

admin_panel_users.details: User Management tab shows users with roles, approval status, and actions. Sync Azure AD and Sync Odoo Users buttons present

admin_panel_roles.details: Roles & Permissions tab shows all roles (Super Admin, CEO, Sales Director, etc.) with permission counts and data scope badges

admin_panel_departments.details: Departments tab shows department cards (Sales, Presales, Product, Strategy, Operations) with Sync from Odoo button

admin_panel_permissions.details: All Permissions tab shows permissions grouped by module (CRM, Datalake, Integrations)

navigation_sidebar.details: All 8 navigation items found and working: Dashboard, Accounts, Opportunities, KPIs, Email, System Config, Integrations, Data Lake. Highlighting works correctly
